sentences.english: In your case, we are prepared to be lenient .
sentences.chinese: 根据你的情况，我们拟予以从宽处理。

sentences.english: In your case, we are prepared to be lenient.
sentences.chinese: 根据你的情况，我们拟予从宽处理。

sentences.english: The judge promised leniency if the offender confessed.
sentences.chinese: 如果罪犯认罪，法官答应从宽发落。

sentences.english: They'll probably go easy on him since he hasn't been in trouble before.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能会对他从宽处理，因为他以前没惹过麻烦。

sentences.english: The man pleaded guilty and threw him self on the mercy of the court.
sentences.chinese: 那个男人服罪，请求法庭从宽处理。

sentences.english: First time offenders can expect leniency whereas repeat offenders can expect severe punishment.
sentences.chinese: 初犯会从宽处理，而惯犯会受到严厉的惩罚。

sentences.english: It was his youth and inexperience that got him off.
sentences.chinese: 他因年幼无知而受到从宽处理。

sentences.english: The king was very lenient towards his error, and decided to give him the lightest punishment.
sentences.chinese: 国王对他的错误网开三面，决定从宽发落。

sentences.english: The court let the criminal off with a light sentence because he had made a fairly honest confession.
sentences.chinese: 法院从宽发落了这个罪犯，因为他坦白得比较彻底。
